  • *Description**
MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • Independently plans and executes research in support of assigned development projects.
  • Identifies gaps in laboratory capabilities and safety matters. Independently develops solutions.
  • Organizes and presents data of a complex nature and draws sound scientific conclusions.
  • Independently conducts work in agreement with supervisor. Designs and carries out experimental work using appropriate methods and instrumentation.
  • Able to lead NPD projects with minimal supervision; is accountable for achievement of project plan for NPD and Sustaining projects. Can lead Sustaining projects of moderate to high complexity independently.
  • Suggest experimental approaches to complex problems and carry out investigations independently.
  • Design and carry out experiments that scientifically confirm performance, reliability, and shelf life.
  • Collaborate on plan for design verification studies, carry out design verification studies.
  • Independently plan schedule of research according to company?s timetable, and establish daily or weekly routines necessary to meet project timetable.
  • Develop research plan and design experiments of a complex nature.
  • Records experimental data according to established procedures, makes calculations, evaluates results, makes recommendations and maintains accurate records of work.
  • Prepare standard technical reports and memos. Summarizes and communicates data of a complex nature as required.
  • Identifies deficiencies and modifies/improves existing procedures. Authors operating procedures as needed.
  • Develops solutions to problems of intermediate and advanced scope. Skilled in problem solving and root cause analysis.
  • Independently conducts PSP investigations, identified root causes. Can supervise CAPA at basic and intermediate level.
  • Regularly applies scientific theory to reach conclusions based upon data analysis.
  • Contributes to design of experiments at an intermediate and advanced level, can design simple to complex experiments.
  • Collect and analyze information on competitor product performance.
  • Provides training to research associates.
  • Develop in-depth knowledge of new and existing products.
  • Evaluation of ideas, competition products and new technologies.
  • Perform other duties as responsibilities necessitate.
  • *Qualification**
EDUCATION/EXPERIENCE:
  • Ph.D. degree in chemistry, biochemistry or chemical engineering or related fields and 0-3 years of experience in industry or post-doctoral/start-up environments.
  • Understanding of good laboratory practices.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • Good organizational/time management skills.
  • Ability to prioritize.
